Story in game : 

The story begins when a boy (15 years old) goes missing, but the body has not been found, but before the boy disappears, he typed a message telling his brother that he was going to play games at his brother's house. A person who had just met, but his brother had not yet responded to the message. His older brother had disappeared and could not be found again, but his case had not progressed at all and time had passed for more than a year, but there was news of the incident. Similar to his brother's case, there was another missing person and a message was printed telling his girlfriend that he was going to play games with one of his brothers as well, which was speculated by the police. Judged that he was the same villain, but was unable to catch him."Kritsakorn" the younger brother of the first boy who was lost in the first case, but has not found any evidence other than the last message sent to the younger brother, so he is anxious and wants to know that he How did his man disappear because why did not find any evidence and who did it, he began to search for information about the two cases with similar events, namely the killer will invite him to play games with Until one day, he decides to go to a house to get information and think that it's the house where the killer lives there to find out the truth and want to know who the killer kidnapped his brother. and hoping to find the traces of his long lost brother…..
